description: Demolition of garage and rear extensions, and erection of single storey rear extension, two storey side and second floor side extensions. Erection of garage and pool house with glass link together with landscaping. Installation of 2no. side rooflights
decision_conditions: The applicant has provided incomplete or conflicting information relating to the impact on protected trees and the associated risk of harm to those trees and as such officers cannot conclude that the proposed development would not cause harm in this regard. As such the proposal would not accord with policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy.

The Preliminary Ecological Assessment appears to relate to the previous scheme extant plaaning permission 23/01475/HOU and the PEA does not assess the biodiversity impacts and enhancements of the current proposal and as such officers cannot conclude that the proposal would not cause harm to existing biodiversity or that the scheme can achieve any biodiversity enhancements. As such the proposal would not accord with Policy DM6 of the Council's Core Strategy.
